attributes.action: Strip Trevor McDonald of his knighthood after his public racist remarks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to strip Trevor McDonald of his knighthood after his very racist and offensive remarks on the television show "news knight with trevor mcdonald". This program was televised and so cannot fall under the category of being a "Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statement". Had similar remarks been made by a white person against a black person something would have been done by now

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
